General.Name: Chongyi Zhangyuan Tungsten Co Ltd
General.Description: Chongyi Zhangyuan Tungsten Co., Ltd. engages in the mining of tungsten and other metal mineral products in China and internationally. Its products include tungsten concentrate, ammonium paratungstate, tungsten oxide, tungsten powder, tungsten carbide powder, thermal spray powder, and cemented carbide, as well as hard surface materials, bars, ball teeth, and other products. The company was founded in 1990 and is headquartered in Ganzhou, China.
